Text.Text: Sir John Faithful, Reinstated Admiral of the Lost Expedition
After Sir John Faithful miraculously escaped arctic hell, he can't wait to rebuild your airship fleet.
Born in La Corona, El Presidente traveled across the known world before he dedicated himself to the treasure hunt in the inhospitable region of the ice desert.
Ming Shu, Sharp tongue of the eastern capital
Hired from the Far East, Ming can wrap any man around her little finger while bargaining without him noticing.
Jürgen Vogel, Lifter of flying crates
Despite his constantly bad mood, Jürgen is valued by every crew, as no one else can arrange the freight boxes as efficiently as he can.
With steam flowing through her veins, no headwind can slow her down in the persuit of total speed.
James Fitzjames, Expert on the pulley
The pulley blocks of any ship fear his speed when loading the goods.
